fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night, dealing a Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Due to being hard to hit underwater, you have permanent basic defense.
- If you kill a Town member, you lose your defense. If you have no defense, you lose your attack
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, there are no penalties for killing Town members.
